title: He Left the UK to Become a PIG FARMER in Nigeria?

tasks.task: Operation of a large-scale pig farm and feed production business
subtasks: Managing over 2,000 pigs across multiple breeds
Breeding pigs and managing different growth stages (piglets, growers)
Compounding livestock feed using on-site facilities (warehouse, mixers, grinders)
Addressing production challenges (e.g., economic instability, high costs)
Training and consulting services for other farmers

tasks.task: Operating a large-scale pig farm and feed production business
subtasks: Breeding and raising piglets to maturity
Producing livestock feed using on-site facilities
Addressing high production costs and market challenges

tasks.task: Operating a Large-Scale Pig Farm and Feed Production Business.
